name: Word Escapes
description:
Escape reality while playing this addictive word game. Refreshing word association experience! Try to guess all the words and solve all levels! This word association game with hidden themes is a great workout for your brain cells!

Features:
• Hundreds of word puzzles.
• Play in English, French, Spanish, German or Russian.
• Fun way to play word associations.
• Play with your family and friends.

If you like word puzzles, this word search game is for you!
